about_the_game:
The Winning Post series, celebrating its 30th anniversary in 2023, is a realistic horse racing simuluation game where the player becomes an owner-breeder, experiencing the world of horseracing along with the horses and people involved.

Key features:
■ Powerful race scenes that are overwhelmingly realistic and depicted as only a game can!
The 3D models of the racehorses are redesigned for realistic depictions of the beauty and power of the thoroughbreds! Feel the excitement of dramatic race scenes with the combination of in-game production and camera work!

■ "Uma-sonality" revealing the personality of the race horses!
The personalities of the race horses are revealed in the new "uma-sonality"! Not only does it show the horse's personality, but its likes and dislikes, strengths and weaknesses, and various other characteristics. The "uma-sonality" changes based on experience earned in races, events and other situations. As the racehorses grow, their inner self changes so the player's selections and decisions based on trial and error can greatly affect the racehorses' success.

■ Historically accurate training to experience a variety of actual training techniques!
The replication of historically accurate training that had a major influence on Japanese racehorses! Learn not only about effective training techniques, but also the history of Japanese horse racing!

■Popular series features such as scenarios starting in different years, marriage, betting tickets and more!

Note: Pictures are taken from the development version. It might be different in the actual game.

*Trial version does not include major updates; you will only enjoy 7 starting year scenarios and marriage elements.


About "Winning Post 10 Demo Version
You can play 7 starting year scenarios for 1 year each.
The saved data (edit data and story data) from the Demo version can be transferred to the full version.
Players who play the Demo version will receive a gold amulet and 500 million yen in-game gold in the first week of January of the first year.
If you save the data from the Demo version , a record that you played the Demo version will remain in the system data. If you start a new game with the full version, you will receive the Demo bonus in the first week of January of the first year.
If you delete the Demo version, you will not receive the bonus.
For more information about the Demo version, please visit the official website.
detailed_description:
The Winning Post series, celebrating its 30th anniversary in 2023, is a realistic horse racing simuluation game where the player becomes an owner-breeder, experiencing the world of horseracing along with the horses and people involved.

Key features:
■ Powerful race scenes that are overwhelmingly realistic and depicted as only a game can!
The 3D models of the racehorses are redesigned for realistic depictions of the beauty and power of the thoroughbreds! Feel the excitement of dramatic race scenes with the combination of in-game production and camera work!

■ "Uma-sonality" revealing the personality of the race horses!
The personalities of the race horses are revealed in the new "uma-sonality"! Not only does it show the horse's personality, but its likes and dislikes, strengths and weaknesses, and various other characteristics. The "uma-sonality" changes based on experience earned in races, events and other situations. As the racehorses grow, their inner self changes so the player's selections and decisions based on trial and error can greatly affect the racehorses' success.

■ Historically accurate training to experience a variety of actual training techniques!
The replication of historically accurate training that had a major influence on Japanese racehorses! Learn not only about effective training techniques, but also the history of Japanese horse racing!

■Popular series features such as scenarios starting in different years, marriage, betting tickets and more!

Note: Pictures are taken from the development version. It might be different in the actual game.

*Trial version does not include major updates; you will only enjoy 7 starting year scenarios and marriage elements.

You can play 7 starting year scenarios for 1 year each.
The saved data (edit data and story data) from the Demo version can be transferred to the full version.
Players who play the Demo version will receive a gold amulet and 500 million yen in-game gold in the first week of January of the first year.

name: Winning Post 10 体験版

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10/11 64bit（日本語版）
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4370 以上
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 VRAM 2GB 以上／AMD Radeon R7 370 VRAM 2GB 以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit ステレオ 48kHzWAVE 形式が再生可能なサウンドボード
  • Additional Notes: ※1280×720ピクセル表示可能なディスプレイ　※Windows®11 をご使用の場合、Windows®11 のシステム 要件に準じます。
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10/11 64bit（日本語版）
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 以上
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660Ti VRAM 6GB 以上／AMD Radeon RX 5600XT VRAM 6GB 以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit ステレオ 48kHzWAVE 形式が再生可能なサウンドボード
  • Additional Notes: ※1920×1080ピクセル表示可能なディスプレイ　※Windows®11 をご使用の場合、Windows®11 のシステム 要件に準じます。

short_description: The latest in the horse racing simulation series Winning Post, celebrating its 30th anniversary!
